GSD.product_version: versions from v4.17 to before v5.10.110
GSD.description:
remoteproc: qcom_q6v5_mss: Fix some leaks in q6v5_alloc_memory_region

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.110 by commit f7210ca29a783c94478da02368731e4c9cf7cdb7, it was introduced in version v4.17 by commit 278d744c46fd4f1925aec77752d18a0e4a9cbec3. For more details please see the references link.
